ca.ualberta.CMPUT3012019T02.alexandria.adapter

Class ChatRecyclerViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ChatViewHolder>
      • ca.ualberta.CMPUT3012019T02.alexandria.adapter.ChatRecyclerViewAdapter

  • public class ChatRecyclerViewAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ChatViewHolder>
    Recycler View adapter for the chat room list in MessageFragment. Sets up an on click listener for each list item to go to the appropriate chat room.

    • Constructor Summary
